name: Pui Pui Molcar Fan Made Racing Game
name_original: Pui Pui Molcar Fan Made Racing Game
description:
Final Project Submission for DET 220 - Intro to 3D modeling

I would like to preface by saying how accomplished I feel. I stuck this project through to the end, and although it was a lot of extra work, I created a completed and working product. And that itself is deserving of praise. It feels good to be able to say that I have finished a project, even though there are still more things I would like to add.

I hope you enjoy the project as much as I do.
